name: Golden Greenhouse
description:
The garden gnomes have entrusted a Golden Greenhouse into your care. Do you have what it takes to defend it against the hordes of marchigolds, bombelions and whacktuses?

In this tower defence game you will have three defences:

  • Shovellista (a ranged weapon, press 1 on keyboard)
  • Atomizer (a powerful short range weapon, press 2)
  • Mownlawer (a deadly trap to place on the roads, press 3)

After pressing on a button to choose your defence click with a mouse to place them on the map. Placing defences cost money, but you will get more between waves.

Move on the map with WASD

Below you will find the game jam version of the game, and the bug fixed version finished about half an hour after the jam.

To open the game go the Build/Golden Green House  file and open GGJ Test Project.exe.

To exit the game press alt+F4.

Have fun!

Credits:

Sami Uski: programming and logic

Taneli Mäenpää: graphics, music and voicing the gnome

Marras Mustonen: sound effects, trailer video and putting together the Global Game Jam and itch.io pages

This game was made in one weekend for the Global Game Jam 2023 in Jyväskylä, Finland at the Digi & Game Center.

The game was built using GitHub and Unity.
